class.name: DojoQueryBase
class.brief_description: Base class for Dojo queries, providing pagination functionality.
class.description: This class provides the basic properties for pagination, including [member limit], [member cursor], and [member direction]. It is inherited by more specific query classes.

members.member: The cursor to start the query from. Used for pagination.
The direction of pagination. See [enum PaginationDirection].
The maximum number of items to return.
The order in which to sort the results.
